embeds.description:
👋 Greetings! The applications for our Community Manager position are now open! If you're passionate about leading a team, fostering a welcoming atmosphere within our community, organizing engaging events, and managing support efforts, this opportunity is tailor-made for you!

## 🤔 What does a Community Manager do?
A Community Manager is responsible for leading our team of moderators and support staff, creating and managing events, and reviewing forms for moderation and support. This role ensures a vibrant and harmonious environment for all community members.

## ❔ Why join us as a Community Manager?
- Lead a dedicated team to maintain and grow our thriving community.
- Gain valuable experience in community management, event organization, and leadership.

## 📋 How to Apply:
To apply, simply complete the Community Manager Application [here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfcIdl24h9f_QwSos3I4M3XMBSP1hoyJi9r1a6Rf6M4drYyXw/viewform?usp=sf_link). Please ensure that all provided information is accurate and comprehensive.

## 🔎 Requirements
- Strong leadership and communication skills to effectively manage the team and address community concerns.
- Availability to dedicate regular time to community management and event organization.
- Previous experience in community management, event planning, or similar roles is advantageous but not mandatory.

## 📕 Rules
- Applicants must agree to abide by our team guidelines, which can be found [here](https://kyubion-studios.github.io/#-2).

footer.text: All applications will undergo through review, and only successful candidates will be contacted through Discord.
